item.title: 美国最大电网发布周一高温能源紧急警报
item.description: 为大西洋中部至中西部地区约 20% 的美国人提供服务的 PJM Interconnection 宣布发出能源紧急警报，预计在酷热天气下电力需求将攀升至 14—year 新高。【原文：PJM Interconnection, which serves about 20% of Americans in the mid-Atlantic to the Midwest, declared an energy emergency alert with power demand expected to climb to a 14—year high amid intense heat.】

item.title: 期权交易员应对股市对战争风险的微弱反应
item.description: 面对日益加剧的地缘政治威胁，股市近期表现平静，这让期权交易商面临一个难题：是卖出波动率，冒着中东冲突升级时被打懵的风险；还是买入波动率，在实际走势保持低迷时损失权利金。在美国袭击伊朗核基地之后，这种紧张局势将进一步加剧。【原文：The stock market’s recent calm in the face of rising geopolitical threats had left options traders with a conundrum: sell volatility and risk being blindsided should the Middle East conflict escalate; or buy it and bleed away premiums as actual moves stay subdued. That tension is set to ratchet even higher after the US attacked Iranian nuclear sites.】

item.title: 全球投资者将涌向安全地带，等待伊朗的回应
item.description: 交易员们预测，在美国袭击伊朗三大核基地后，投资者为安全起见，股市将下跌，原油价格将跳涨，美元可能会走强。【原文：Traders are forecasting a drop in stocks, a jump in crude prices and possibly a strengthening of the dollar as investors head for safety in the wake of the US attack on Iran’s three main nuclear sites.】

item.title: 被逼入绝境的伊朗如何对全球石油贸易造成破坏
item.description: 美国对伊朗核设施的空袭使人们更加关注伊朗在冲突中尚未真正部署的一个选择：破坏地区石油贸易，特别是通过至关重要的霍尔木兹海峡的石油贸易。【原文：US airstrikes on Iranian nuclear facilities are sharpening the focus on one option Iran has yet to really deploy in the conflict: disrupting regional oil trade, especially through the critical Strait of Hormuz.】

item.title: 亚洲各国央行开始警惕货币干预
item.description: 一些新兴亚洲最大的中央银行似乎正在减少对货币市场的干预。【原文：Some of emerging Asia’s biggest central banks look to be dialing back their interventions in the currency market.】

item.title: 北约提出调整 5%的开支目标以赢得西班牙批准
item.description: 在军事联盟领导人于周二举行会议之前，北约提出对雄心勃勃的国防开支目标的关键措辞进行调整，以帮助赢得持反对意见的西班牙的支持。【原文：NATO has offered to tweak key language on ambitious defense spending targets to help win support from holdout Spain, before leaders of the military alliance gather on Tuesday.】

item.title: 苹果公司要想在人工智能领域取得成功，就必须离开自己的 "舒适区"。
item.description: 苹果需要进行史上最大的收购，才能结束人工智能的失败。还有Meta 推出新款 Oakley 智能眼镜；荣耀准备推出新款超薄可折叠手机；苹果一年一度的返校交易正在进行中。【原文：Apple will need to make the biggest acquisition in its history to put an end to its artificial intelligence debacle. Also: Meta rolls out new Oakley smart glasses; Honor prepares a new ultrathin foldable phone; and Apple’s annual back-to-school deal gets underway.】

item.title: 中国谴责特朗普对伊朗的袭击，这是自美国发动袭击以来的首次评论
item.description: 中国批评了美国对伊朗核设施的打击，并再次表示愿意加入国际社会恢复中东和平的努力。【原文：China criticized the US strike on Iranian nuclear facilities and again said it’s willing to join international efforts to restore peace in the Middle East.】

item.title: 美国打击伊朗后，英国航空公司停飞迪拜和卡塔尔航班
item.description: 英国航空公司暂停了飞往迪拜和多哈的航班，在美国打击伊朗三处核设施、德黑兰誓言报复之后，波斯湾地区的航空中断加剧。【原文：British Airways paused flights to Dubai and Doha, increasing aviation disruptions in the Persian Gulf after the US struck three nuclear sites in Iran and Tehran vowed to retaliate.】

item.title: 森特诺告诉《新闻报》，欧元区经济需要更多欧洲央行刺激措施
item.description: 欧洲中央银行理事会成员马里奥-森特诺告诉意大利《新闻报》，欧洲中央银行需要为欧元区经济提供 "进一步刺激"。【原文：The European Central Bank needs to provide the euro-area economy with “further stimulus,” Governing Council member Mario Centeno told Italy’s La Stampa.】

item.title: 马来西亚称美国同意在最后期限前完成贸易谈判
item.description: 马来西亚投资、贸易和工业部表示，马来西亚和美国已同意在关税缓期到期前完成贸易谈判。【原文：Malaysia and the US have agreed to finalize trade negotiations before the tariff reprieve expires, the Malaysia’s Ministry of Investment, Trade and Industry said.】

item.title: 科威特、阿曼股市下滑，中东股市对美国袭击作出反应
item.description: 科威特和阿曼的股票交易所周日开盘小幅下跌，提前显示了股票投资者对美国攻击伊朗的反应，他们在关注石油供应中断和德黑兰可能的报复。【原文：Stock exchanges in Kuwait and Oman opened marginally lower Sunday in an early indication of equity investors’ reaction to the US attacks on Iran, as they watched out for oil-supply disruptions and Tehran’s potential retaliation.】

item.title: 美国对伊朗的打击正值全球经济脆弱之际
item.description: 美国对伊朗三大主要核设施的打击正值全球经济的脆弱时刻，其前景现在取决于伊斯兰共和国的报复力度。【原文：US strikes on Iran’s three main nuclear facilities come at a fragile moment for the global economy, and the outlook now hinges on how forcefully the Islamic Republic retaliates.】

item.title: 法拉奇的崛起使英格兰银行的独立性受到质疑
item.description: 自戈登-布朗将利率控制权交给英格兰银行以来的近三十年间，人们普遍认为此举在帮助控制通胀方面取得了成功。现在，这一共识似乎正在瓦解。【原文：In the nearly three decades since Gordon Brown handed control of interest rates to the Bank of England, the move has been broadly viewed as a success in helping to keep inflation under control. Now that consensus appears to be breaking down.】

item.title: 港股大涨颠覆投资者对中国的看法
item.description: 进入 2025 年，华尔街看好中国在岸股票，指望中国政府的刺激政策能缓解美国关税带来的打击。但六个月过去了，他们大错特错。【原文：Wall Street entered 2025 with bullish bets on onshore Chinese stocks, counting on Beijing’s stimulus drive to cushion the blow from US tariffs. Six months in, they couldn’t have been more wrong.】

item.title: 英国将投资 2.75 亿英镑培训英国技术工人
item.description: 英国首相基尔-斯塔默（Keir Starmer）希望加快经济增长，减少对外国劳动力的依赖，因此英国将投资 2.75 亿英镑（约合 3.71 亿美元）发展本国的技术劳动力。【原文：The UK will invest £275 million ($371 million) to grow the country’s skilled workforce as Prime Minister Keir Starmer seeks to accelerate economic growth and reduce reliance on foreign labor.】

item.title: 特朗普在伊朗问题上一波三折，令石油交易商左右为难
item.description: 石油市场正在与唐纳德-特朗普在伊朗和以色列冲突中的下一步行动搏斗，美国总统在这场战斗中的一言一行似乎都有可能导致油价飙升或暴跌。【原文：The oil market is wrestling with Donald Trump’s next act in the conflict between Iran and Israel, with the US president’s every utterance over the fighting seemingly capable of spiking or crashing prices.】

item.title: 美国温和通胀是美联储鲍威尔在国会山演讲的背景
item.description: 美国 5 月份的通胀率可能有所上升，但几乎没有证据表明与关税有关的广泛影响，而美联储预计这些影响将在今年晚些时候变得更加明显。【原文：US inflation probably inched higher in May, offering scant evidence of extensive tariff-related repercussions that the Federal Reserve expects to become more apparent later in the year.】

item.title: 中国生物技术公司展示挑战礼来肥胖症药物的产品
item.description: 在一项后期临床试验中，一种来自中国的肥胖症药物帮助患者减轻了大量体重，使其有望成为诺和诺德公司（Novo Nordisk A/S）和礼来公司（Eli Lilly & Co.【原文：An obesity drug from China helped patients lose a lot of weight in a late-stage clinical trial, making it a prospective new challenger to blockbusters from Novo Nordisk A/S and Eli Lilly & Co.】

item.title: 商业地产困境正在蔓延：信贷周刊
item.description: 在借贷成本飙升和在家工作的兴起导致贷款人容易遭受损失之后，美国商业地产信贷的痛苦继续浮出水面。【原文：The pain in US commercial real estate credit continues to bubble to the surface after a surge in borrowing costs and the rise of work from home left lenders vulnerable to losses.】

item.title: 加拿大称网络设备遭与中国有关的黑客攻击
item.description: 加拿大网络安全机构称，中国支持的黑客很可能是最近针对国内电信基础设施的恶意活动的幕后黑手，并警告说一家加拿大公司注册的三台网络设备在攻击中被入侵。【原文：Canada’s cybersecurity agency said Chinese-backed hackers were likely behind recent malicious activity targeting domestic telecommunications infrastructure, warning that three network devices registered to a Canadian company were compromised in the attacks.】

item.title: 刚果将钴出口禁令延长三个月以限制供应
item.description: 根据监管机构的一份声明，刚果民主共和国将钴出口临时禁令延长了三个月，从而延长了其抑制国际市场供应过剩的努力。【原文：The Democratic Republic of Congo extended a temporary ban on cobalt exports for an additional three months, according to a statement from a regulatory agency, prolonging its efforts to rein in a glut on the international market.】

item.title: 被锁在伊朗领空之外的航空公司转走阿富汗航线
item.description: 在中东大片地区的领空变成禁飞区后，阿富汗上空变得越来越拥挤，因为航空公司正在寻找连接亚洲和欧美的替代航线。【原文：After the air space across large swaths of the Middle East turned into a no-fly zone, the skies over Afghanistan have become increasingly crowded as airlines seek alternative flight paths to connect Asia with Europe and the US.】

item.title: 股市走向取决于美联储对未知因素的看法
item.description: 对于投资者和交易商来说，如果他们想知道 2025 年下半年美国经济、股市或利率的走向，那就祝他们好运吧。现在有太多的不确定性，根本无法确定任何事情。【原文：For investors and traders trying to game out where the US economy, the stock market or interest rates are headed in the second half of 2025, good luck. There’s simply too much uncertainty to be sure of anything right now.】

item.title: 越南明星科技公司 VNG 首席执行官称仍计划在美国上市
item.description: 越南科技公司 VNG 集团首席执行官 Kelly Wong 表示，该公司去年推迟了在美国的首次公开募股，但仍计划在美国上市，时间未定。【原文：Vietnam tech firm VNG Group, which delayed a US initial public offering last year, still plans an American listing at an undetermined time, Chief Executive Officer Kelly Wong said.】

item.title: 美国气候数据退步给中国带来新机遇
item.description: 古埃及人清楚地认识到监测天气或至少是天气影响的经济和政治重要性。他们发明了 "尼罗河水位计"，这是一种测量尼罗河洪水的装置，可以预测农业产量（从而预测税收）。2015 年闯入澳大利亚气象局的外国情报人员也很可能清楚这一点（中国否认与此有关）。【原文：The economic and political importance of monitoring the weather — or at least the effects of weather — was clear to the ancient Egyptians. They came up with the “nilometer,” a device measuring Nile River flooding that could predict agricultural (and thus tax) yields. It also was likely clear to foreign intelligence agents breaching Australia’s Bureau of Meteorology in 2015 (China denied any involvement).】

item.title: 施莱格尔称，比起 "正常 "降准，瑞士央行降准至负值将是更大的进步
item.description: 瑞士国家银行行长马丁-施莱格尔（Martin Schlegel）表示，降息至零以下比降息至零以上的意义更大，这表明瑞士央行在采取这一举措时可能会犹豫不决。【原文：Swiss National Bank President Martin Schlegel said cutting interest rates below zero is a more significant move than a reduction above that level, suggesting the central bank may be hesitant to take such a step.】

item.title: 机器人蜂箱和人工智能如何降低蜂群崩溃的风险
item.description:
在经历了 150 年的乏善可陈之后，蜂箱正在升级，从而更容易保护蜂群和依赖蜂群的农作物。【原文：

After 150 years without minimal innovation, the beehive is getting an upgrade that is making it easier to protect colonies and the crops that rely on them.

】

item.title: 俄罗斯最高石油主管称 "欧佩克+"提高产量是明智之举
item.description: 俄罗斯石油公司首席执行官伊戈尔-谢钦（Igor Sechin）表示，鉴于中东冲突的发展态势，欧佩克+集团为增加石油供应而采取的措施证明是明智的。【原文：Steps taken by the OPEC+ group to boost oil supplies have proved astute, given developments in the Middle East conflict, according to Rosneft PJSC Chief Executive Officer Igor Sechin.】

item.title: 全球经济图表：主要央行维持利率不变
item.description: 本周，美国、英国和日本的央行行长在利率问题上保持沉默，因为官员们正试图评估关税、经济活动的不确定性和中东战争的影响。【原文：Central bankers in the US, UK and Japan held the line on interest rates this week as officials attempt to gauge the impact of tariffs, uncertainty about economic activity and war in the Middle East.】
